OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

onDecrypt(uint256,bytes,bytes).details: 回调签名固定：(uint256 requestID, bytes cleartexts, bytes decryptionProof)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: ColorGuess - 使用 FHEVM 的链上猜颜色小游戏（单合约实现）

HandlesAlreadySavedForRequestID().notice: Returned if some handles were already saved for corresponding ID.

InvalidKMSSignatures().notice: Returned if the returned KMS signatures are not valid.

NoHandleFoundForRequestID().notice: Returned if there was not handle found for the requested ID.

DecryptionFulfilled(uint256).notice: This event is emitted when requested decryption has been fulfilled.

getMyLastResultHandle().notice: 返回玩家最近一次猜测结果的密文句柄（ebool）。前端可用 FHEVM 用户解密。

guess(bytes32,bytes).notice: 提交加密的猜测值（颜色索引）。同时： - 保存 ebool 结果句柄并授权给用户（便于前端“用户解密”展示） - 触发 Oracle 解密请求，回调中进行清算（ETH 奖励/手续费）

onDecrypt(uint256,bytes,bytes).notice: Oracle 回调：解密结果校验 + 结算

startGame().notice: 开始新的一局（支付参与费）。合约用 FHE 生成密文目标颜色索引。

userdoc.notice: 与 Zama 官方用法一致：外部加密输入 + FHE 同态运算 + ACL 授权 + 用户解密
